Key Match Events: Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan registered a century stand
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand and Pakistan are unchanged for the key clash
Toss: New Zealand opt to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan are the first finalists of T20 World Cup 2022
Rizwan takes the Player of the Match for his top-scoring effort of 57
Miscellaneous Highlights: Six out of seven games have been won by teams batting first here at the SCG
Others: No fast bowler at the T20 World Cup has played for as long, no bowler has taken as many T20I wickets as Tim Southee
